'''Scattered Page''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Book of Esoteric Revelations}}.

==Text==
...See that? That's the conclusion the world-formula arrived at after countless calculations. The scene we foresaw, the destruction after the [[cataclysm]], and this world where not even a [[Sweet Flower]] or a [[Mint]] can grow... That is the end of all things...<br>
...Do you believe it at last? Whether you have arrived at this place via the [[Book of Revealing]] or the [[Looking Glass]], lend me your strength, that we may avoid this future...<br>
...Just as I said, the only way is...
